firstName.minLength: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
firstName.maxLength: First name must be max 30 characters long.
firstName.pattern: First name must have the following syntax : First letter uppercase, some characters are forbidden.

name.minLength: Name must be at 2 characters long.
name.maxLength: Name must be max 30 characters long.
name.pattern: Name must have the following sytax : All letters uppercase, some characters are forbidden.

dateOfBirth.pattern: Date of birth must have the following syntax : jj / mm / aaaa and between [1920-2009].

phoneNumber.minLength: Phone number must be at least 9 characters long.
phoneNumber.maxLength: Phone number must be max 13 characters long.

email.minLength: Email must be at least 3 characters long.
email.maxLength: Email must be max 70 characters long.
email.email: Email must be a valid address.

password.minLength: Password must be at least 5 characters long.
password.maxLength: Password must be max 30 characters long.

confirmPassword.minLength: Password confirmation must be at least 5 characters long.
confirmPassword.maxLength: Password confirmation must be max 30 characters long.
confirmPassword.unmatch: Confirmation password must match with password.

form.name: Name
form.acceptGeneralConditions: I accept the general conditions of use
